tasks.label: Run(Debug)
tasks.command: ulimit -s 1048576 && cargo equip --bin ${fileBasenameNoExtension} > submit.rs && cargo run --bin ${fileBasenameNoExtension} <test/in

tasks.label: Run(Release)
tasks.command: ulimit -s 1048576 && cargo equip --bin ${fileBasenameNoExtension} > submit.rs && /usr/bin/time -v cargo run --bin ${fileBasenameNoExtension} --release <test/in 2> >(awk '/User/||/System/||/Elap/||/Max/')
